basic_information.scholarship_name: Latisha Pollard Coffey Scholarship for Art

description: This scholarship was established in 1983 by Troy and Marceline Pollard in honor of their late daughter LaTisha Pollard Coffey, who passed away earlier in the same year at the age of 33. LaTisha graduated from UCO, then known as Central State University, with a degree in art and a minor in mathematics. Recipient must demonstrate excellence in your area of emphasis and showcase effective writing skills. Eligibility Art major Cumulative GPA 3.25+ Sophomore, junior, senior or graduate student Enrolled in 6+ hours of art coursework Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
